title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.10 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.10 - Definition

State Regulations

Except as provided in section
335.15
of this Part, a term
appointment shall be an appointment for a specified period of not more than
three years, which shall automatically expire at the end of that period unless
terminated earlier because of resignation, retirement or
termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
